text: Say: should we call on other than God, that which does not benefit us and does not harm us, and to be turned on our heels (to disbelief) after God guided us, like someone whom the devils infatuated and left him baffled on the earth, and he has companions who invite him to the guidance (saying): come to us. Say: Godâ€™s guidance is the (only true) guidance, and we are ordered to submit to the Master of Human kind
